global.aiFeaturesText: АвтоФото has all the features that a successful dealership needs to build a strong brand and sell more vehicles faster.
global.easyToUseText: Built with simplicity in mind, АвтоФото offers an intuitive interface and user-friendly tools making it perfect for all skill levels.
global.allInOneText: Showcase your inventory just like a professional. Meet or exceed manufacturers’ photo brand guidelines.
global.virtualShowroomText: Select a standard backdrop or have us create a unique virtual showroom that is bespoke to your branding specifications.
global.mobileOptimisedText: Catch 360 is mobile-optimised which ensures an immersive experience on mobile devices like smartphones and tablets.
global.automaticDataSyncText: Catch 360 connects to market-leading dealer management systems and online marketplaces for quick and easy data transfer.

360.videoText1: Turn static images into a powerful
360.videoSubtext: Discover how easy it is to create a seamless 360° view that’s sure to get your vehicles on the buyer’s shortlist.

moreSolutions.catchPhotoText: Advanced image capturing and editing for impressive results.
moreSolutions.catchCreatorText: Create unique backdrops that put the vehicle front and centre.
moreSolutions.catchPanelText: Easily manage, view and download all images from anywhere, anytime.
moreSolutions.catchConnecttext: Automatically transfer images to a DMS and online marketplaces.
moreSolutions.catch360Text: Turn static images into an interactive showroom experience.

aiSection.catchSubtitle: Simplicity meets genius that redefines picture perfect.
aiSection.catchDesc: The АвтоФото app turns any smartphone into a powerful image capture and editing tool specifically designed to accelerate speed-to-sale at automotive dealerships.
aiSection.creatorSubtitle: Maximise the selling power of your photos.
aiSection.creatorDesc: Create backdrops that put the vehicle front and centre. Elevate your brand, captivate potential buyers and achieve stunning visuals that demand attention.
aiSection.panelSubtitle: Catch Panel is the epitome of practicality.
aiSection.panelDesc: Images captured in the АвтоФото app are automatically saved to the Catch Panel. It provides batch image processing and management.
aiSection.connectSubtitle: Staying well connected has never been easier.
aiSection.connectDesc: Catch Connect makes it possible for АвтоФото to transfer image files to leading dealer management systems (DMS) and online marketplaces.
aiSection.title3: photography and editing app for automotive dealerships

autopilotSection.brandedCollageDesc: The perfect hero shot for any vehicle detail page (VDP). The collage is created automatically and stored as a separate image after processing
